channel.title: 508 Problem
channel.description:
hey guys i reposted this becuase my other one was delted so here it is what my problem is.
Ok so i need a ::item command for my server but i already had one but i had to pay for the item but when i had money and did the ::item command no item appeared in my iventory.
Also i was putting some commands in my quest tab when i found that some of the quest will not be re-written to what i want it to be i will post what quest's it is after i got to go sleep now :P
Thanks if u help :)
My msn is freeky_enemy@live.co.uk would like it if u added me and helped me on that.

item.title: 508 Problem
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

I dont know how knowledgeable you are with java, but put this code in the place of your old one… you might need to tweak some things in it. idk

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“item”)
&& (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“your_name_here”))) {
try {
int newitem = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

                if (newitem >= 0) { 
                    ItemHandler.addItem(newitem, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1],
                            playerId, false);
                    ItemHandler.itemExists(newitem, absX, absY);
                } else {
                    sendMessage("No such item");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Bad item ID");
            }[/code]

Read full topic
